text: Krzysztof Nykiel (born August 8, 1982 in Łódź) is a Polish professional footballer who is a defender for Zawisza Bydgoszcz in the Polish I liga. ==Career== ===Club=== Nykiel made 6 appearances for Polonia Warsaw during the 2005-06 season, and made 21 appearances for Ruch during the 2007-08 season. He is still looking for his first goal in the Ekstraklasa. In June 2011, he moved to Cracovia on a three-year contract.Oficjalnie: Krzysztof Nykiel w Cracovii 16.06.2011, wp.pl ==References== ==External links== * Category:1982 births Category:Living people Category:Polish footballers Category:Polish beach soccer players Category:Korona Kielce players Category:Unia Janikowo players Category:Polonia Warsaw players Category:Ruch Chorzów players Category:KS Cracovia players Category:Ekstraklasa players Category:Sportspeople from Łódź Category:Association football defenders
title: Krzysztof Nykiel
